title: 3 Ways Parents Protect Kids From Social Media’s Mental Health Effects
description: 3 Ways Parents Protect Kids From Social Media Allowing our kids to use social media while protecting their mental health takes time and effort from parents.
content:
The best way to protect your child from social media's negative mental health effects is to engage ... [+] with them about it.
